column3: “Raspberry kush is on fleek. Just what I needed after a long week of campaigning. It's got a pretty high THC content (19.88%) for an Indica. Remember kids - this shit is lit, fam. Have fun being horny and hungry!”

“Looks: Dense light green nugs with dark orange hairs and light purple in the inside with even a hint of some light pink.

Smell: Pine-Sol smell, with a strong raspberry yogurt smell as soon as you break open a nug.

Taste: Very smooth for how hard it hits you, very tasty kush taste with a light after taste of raspberry yogurt.

Buzz Type: Really strong indica effects but you can definitely tell that there is so...”

“This is my new favorite strain! I smoke the flower for anxiety, depression and PTSD. This beautiful strain instantly made me more relaxed than I have possibly ever been. It is great for muscle tension and a racing mind. Everything tastes better, smells better, feels better sounds better and my worried mind finally gets a break. My creativity level is at an all time high. After years of powerful medications with awful...”

“Migraine pain undeterminable; nausea 8 when I medicated round 0600 or so. Takes bout 10 min to start working. Pain gone; nausea all but gone (3-4). Nausea has been really awful period; no matter what. No anxiety/paranoia which is a Godsend for me. Body high allowed me to get some much needed sleep as I slept really poor last night. Head high heavy as hell which is exactly what I needed/wanted. Top quality sleeper bud...”

“Now I have tried the Select Strains' vape concentrate of Raspberry Kush, but the flower Razzberry Kush might be different, I'm not sure, though they do seem to share a lot of qualities so I'm reviewing it here. I picked up this indica flower at Glisan Buds, it is stinky dank, and what I am smoking tonite. The bud smells like deep, ripe raspberry with masculine musk undertones. The first inhale goes on like a velvet g...”

“If I could give this one 6 stars I would. I highly recommend this one for body pain. Its magnificent anti anxiety with a natural and effective calming effect. Raspberry kush is the very definition of a strain that melts the days troubles away" was also terrific at shutting off my hamster wheel brain of problems and crisis that is just a part of life all us adults must face head on. Raspberry kush is the very best at...”"

“Strain: Razberry Kush
THC: 20.01%
CBD: 0.61%
Grower: Unknown
Location found: Natural Wonders
Date purchased: 2.19.16
Price: $31.50 with discount on an ⅛th 
Method of Consumption: Bic lighter (until Herb Iron is returned from the shop) and a small Trixter glass bong 
Smell: It lives up to the name; straight up berries. Fruit and flowery highlights. This smells like dessert at a fine restaurant. The smell also retrieve...”
“This is the best strain for anxiety I've eve smoked,  and it really does taste like Rasberry.”
“This is the best strain for anxiety I've eve smoked,  and it really does taste like Rasberry.”

“This stuff is amazing for a Kush, it's a hybrid indica dominant strain. There is some Sativa in the hybrid. And you can feel it a strong head high that creeps into a strong body stone. Yet you are able to still function, a bit of couch lock in the picture though. Not that you cannot manage do things . Gaming is excellent, Music is orgasmic, And all your pain is gone. This is a 10/10 in my book, my new favorite strain...”

“First time I had this strain was with my second mom in the backyard. She told me she got it in a mystery pack from her dealer. It was visibly purple, it smelled sweet, and it tasted absolutely amazing. It made me relax and feel at ease. The second time I had it was two hours later when her son and his friend brought 5g of RK and oh my gosh it was heaven. I am very happy with this strain. By far my favorite indica.”

“This is the best strain i've ever smoked for Anxiety, i feel uplifted and focussed, this isnt a stoney but more of a high,  it doesnt feel like an indica normally does, and theres a heavy body high also, this strain feels CBD rich.”

“This is the best weed I have smoked in awhile and I've been smoking Nice Guy and Cherry Pie etc. if earthy flavored weed disgusts you this is the one because its yummy!!!! It even got me laughing and feeling like i was in that new side of perception. Great for arousal, happiness, giggly ness, euphoria, and hunger.”

“Raspberry Kush is a huge hit with all of my patients. The deep hues purple leaves are a sight for sore eyes. The buds are coated with a dusty glitter, much like that of frozen morning dew. The orange hairs set the plant ablaze like orange lightning bolts against a stormy purple sky. My patients report decreased nausea, insomnia and anxiety as well as temporary relief from arthritis, joint pain and muscle aches. 4.9 r...”
“TOK”

“Two things.
One. It is one of those strains that you still enjoy in a joint as much as vaping it. Good taste.
Two. Best cannabis strain for sex, makes you horny and doesn't stop your from being active.

No couch lock, just relaxing, relatively clear headed high.”
“One of my favorite night time strains. It has a sweet taste and a smooth hit. I feel the effects immediately, and it increases as the high creeps in.”
“Soothing.  Felt shoulder and neck pain slowly melt away.  Relaxation without the couch lock or heavy eyelids.  Nice afternoon medication for when you still have to get stuff around the house done.”

“This stuff is really good for muscle pain and anxiety! No couch lock but really relaxed. It's nice if you're around friends, because you can focus pretty well and it makes you social. Hit really fast and lasted  2/3 hours! It's super tasty too- lots of raspberry and a minty aftertaste.”

“First time I've tried it, and it seriously rivals my all time favorite, Jillybean. As a low THC tolerance and petite female, I'm always worried I'll overdo it so I take it slow at first! Baby puffs & a mini bubbler. But man... this Legit RBK had me already wanting more! The taste was lingering and sweet, fresh, floral. Can't wait to try it in the form of a concentrate! 🍓🍒🔥♥️”

“I used a Mighty and a bong with extra filtration. The flavor came through so beautifully. The effects are extremely relaxing.  All of your stress will just melt away. I have a panic disorder as well as Ehlers-Danlos and the pain just melts away.  I am using this as a daily medicinal so what ever you do, do not drive impaired on this strain while on blood thinners or without, your vision will get a bit blurry so bewar...”

“it was a pretty bud with a really great smell to it. i felt extremely productive after smoking a bowl and got a lot done without even realizing it. lol i would recommend this bud for any daytime functional smokers for sure.”
“Love this strain, the aroma and flavor are outstanding! Wonderful light feeling, great for spending the chilling 😎”

“Absolutely love this strain. It helps me a ton when I am experiencing gastrointestinal cramping from my condition. I highly recommend this strain, especially if you are prone to anything that involves physical discomfort or pain. I smoked a single bowl and felt not only the immense physical relief from the flower, but a surprisingly strong feeling of euphoria. It is a relaxing bud that doesn't leave you blurry-eyed o...”

“Raspberry Candy Kush. An exceptionally flavorful strain. Fruit and kush are a match made in heaven. That raspberry goodness, combined with the piney delight of OG Kush creates a brilliant and delectable marijuana strain that's hard to find but easy to consume. The effects are a strong body high that may leave you stuck where ever you sit. On the other hand, you may be filled with a burst of...lets do this, and as a r...”

“Absolutely love this strain. It helps me a ton when I am experiencing gastrointestinal cramping from my condition. I highly recommend this strain, especially if you are prone to anything that involves physical discomfort or pain. I smoked a single bowl and felt not only the immense physical relief from the flower, but a surprisingly strong feeling of euphoria. It is a relaxing bud that doesn't leave you blurry-eyed o...”

“I really enjoyed this bud it was great tasting on the exhale and was long lasting, it was the best high i have experienced so far, it made me wanna get up and dance to the music i was listening to, and i wouldn't recommend to a first time smoker though cause a few times i smoked it i was a little over paranoid. and some people might not kno how to deal with that.  the only negatives i experienced otherwise are dry mo...”
“I love this strain. When started smoking I bought some of this it is so good, not really hungry nor sleepy just very relaxed high.”
“This is one of my favorite strains. I got it at a club in the bay area when I was on my way back home and it was honestly one of the best buds I've ever tasted!”

“This is a strain I was given when I asked for an upbeat indica I could dab. Raspberry Kush is a great daytime indica. Even though this thing packs full body relaxation, it has enough energy to make you want to be up and moving. I absolutely loved a bit of this on my lunch break, plenty of energy to finish the day,  really nice flavor too. The stuff was by Dab Dudes it was 88.8 % total, was a sparkling amber butter th...”
“Nice taste, very smooth high.”
“Very relaxing strain, but I felt much more energetic with it than most indicas. Watched some funny TV and couldn't wipe the smile off my face. Very good body high.”
“This is one of my favorite strains. I got it at a club in the bay area when I was on my way back home and it was honestly one of the best buds I've ever tasted!”

“My first indica strain. I generally prefer sativa strains however I was more in the mood for something heavier when I got this. This did the trick wonderfully. Mild to moderate head high with a good body high to go along with it. Pick yourself up some of this, find a location at home to be comfy at and just relax. Or better yet, do what I did and find someone to play with, you'll want to do that too.”

“This is a strain I was given when I asked for an upbeat indica I could dab. Raspberry Kush is a great daytime indica. Even though this thing packs full body relaxation, it has enough energy to make you want to be up and moving. I absolutely loved a bit of this on my lunch break, plenty of energy to finish the day,  really nice flavor too. The stuff was by Dab Dudes it was 88.8 % total, was a sparkling amber butter th...”
“Nice taste, very smooth high.”
“Delicious strain. Just very relaxing, felt stimulating creatively.”

“Great Indica,really nice Berry Fruity Flavor and Smell. Im most definitely feeling a body high,very relaxed,calm,and collective. Perfect night time strain and sleep inducing meaning its great if your in need of instant sleep.”
“Smooth smoke, not too harsh on the cough, taste great”
“Excellent smoke, great for nighttime use or if you are trying to have a slow day. Good for meditation.”
“Smooth smoke, not too harsh on the cough, taste great”
“this is definetaly one of the best strains ive ever had great flavor and amazing high”
“Excellent smoke, great for nighttime use or if you are trying to have a slow day. Good for meditation.”

“Great body relaxer really mellows your physical being. I anticipated this strain to make me a bit sleepy but found it surprisingly alert for as mellow as my body feels. A nice movie or some snuggling could be in order.”

“Indica with a head buzz accompanied with anxiety. I prefer indicas to be much more relaxing than this strain. Raspberry Kush is not for me. Indicas that offer much more relaxation and euphoria without anxiety include Mendo's Breath, Afgoo, and Grandaddy Purple.”
“Some of the tastiest buds in town !!!”

“I got this from a local dispensary called Rainbow. This is the best strain I have had in a while. It took away almost all my pain, and helped significantly with my anxiety and depression. The taste and smell are subtle, but nice. Not a heavy couch lock, but some, made me feel pretty creative. Would def. get again.”

“Excellent strain if you're looking to chill with friends. The cotton mouth is hell but well worth it. Pretty good body high that works well for pain relief if you don't have any plans.  Kept me awake but very very relaxed. I felt talkative and creative. Great Strain to break out of writer's block.”

“Excellent strain if you're looking to chill with friends. The cotton mouth is hell but well worth it. Pretty good body high that works well for pain relief if you don't have any plans.  Kept me awake but very very relaxed. I felt talkative and creative. Great Strain to break out of writer's block.”
“Lived up to its billing with respect to its ability to enhance the musical experience.  Highly recommended for those intent upon grooving out...”
“Tried this strain last week. Based on reviews, it seems to be a popular favorite. For some reason, this one wasn't for me. I felt no difference after smoking.”

“Indica with a head buzz accompanied with anxiety. I prefer indicas to be much more relaxing than this strain. Raspberry Kush is not for me. Indicas that offer much more relaxation and euphoria without anxiety include Mendo's Breath, Afgoo, and Grandaddy Purple.”
“Smooth smoke, not too harsh on the cough, taste great”
“Rasberry Kush smells and tastes like Raspberry. It gave me an alright Body High. That's all I can really say, it's not the greatest bud ever.”
“Ok for just chilling out.  Potent enough to feel right away but doesn't last long.  Earthy and cottonmouth.”

“I vaped Raspberry Kush via cartridge concentrate. My Raspberry Kush tested at 58.87% THC and 2.04% CBD.  It tastes phenomenal, like a rich raspberry cream desert made with tons of butter.  

I really like how clean and pure these concentrates are - no ash or ashy taste, just pure cannabis. Mmm!

The high is exactly the  indica high I like so much; couch lock and relaxation all the way, Baybee!   This strain is perfec...”
“Tried this strain last week. Based on reviews, it seems to be a popular favorite. For some reason, this one wasn't for me. I felt no difference after smoking.”
“Really relaxing strain. Smells and tastes delicious. Great for my anxiety.”
“Ok for just chilling out.  Potent enough to feel right away but doesn't last long.  Earthy and cottonmouth.”

“I love green that taste of sweet, flowery, and pine flavors so when I saw it's supposed to taste like Raspberries and a creamy vanilla I swooped up a gram of flower. The taste is hard to describe, but I don't get the raspberry or vanilla at all.. It's not bad, just not amazing. I feel like this indica strain does a great job with pain and discomfort. Minimal cognitive impairments and doesn't make me want to pass out....”

“Coming in at only 19% I didn't expect dthis strain to pack this type of punch the flavors in unreal ... might be my favorite indaca rite now 💯 PS the A-pinene is a high 7mg giving it a different taste and Body high Thanks again Medizin”
“Makes me talk my ass off,,killer bud,, really love it .. Reminds me of old-school Maui wowie I live in Waikiki and we love owe buds .. Aloha”
“made my mind gittery and weird. feel a bit depressed after. tastes good though.  try purple kush if you don't like this one.”
“best high for hanging out with friends!”

“Personally, one of my favorites. Love the mellow raspberry cream flavor. Great evening smoker. I use this strain for my anxiety and insomnia. And it works wonders! I have been sleeping soundly ever since I started smoking this before bed!  Will make sure to always have this one on hand.”

“Coming in at only 19% I didn't expect dthis strain to pack this type of punch the flavors in unreal ... might be my favorite indaca rite now 💯 PS the A-pinene is a high 7mg giving it a different taste and Body high Thanks again Medizin”

“I vaped Raspberry Kush via cartridge concentrate. My Raspberry Kush tested at 58.87% THC and 2.04% CBD.  It tastes phenomenal, like a rich raspberry cream desert made with tons of butter.  

I really like how clean and pure these concentrates are - no ash or ashy taste, just pure cannabis. Mmm!

The high is exactly the  indica high I like so much; couch lock and relaxation all the way, Baybee!   This strain is perfec...”
“A nice wee body high. Relaxation and happiness is what this strain brings. Helps with insomnia, stress and pain.”

“Great body relaxer really mellows your physical being. I anticipated this strain to make me a bit sleepy but found it surprisingly alert for as mellow as my body feels. A nice movie or some snuggling could be in order.”

“I love green that taste of sweet, flowery, and pine flavors so when I saw it's supposed to taste like Raspberries and a creamy vanilla I swooped up a gram of flower. The taste is hard to describe, but I don't get the raspberry or vanilla at all.. It's not bad, just not amazing. I feel like this indica strain does a great job with pain and discomfort. Minimal cognitive impairments and doesn't make me want to pass out....”
“love the sweet smell and it doesnt lay you down for a kush”
“Tastes good and it's relaxing. Definitely great for chilling on a weekend.”
“Relieves stress, pain, and has an overall positive feel. I spent the hour making a music video. :)”

“This one was great for a night chilling with friends. Made good conversation and later was amazing for some gaming. Wouldn't suggest for a busy day.  Nice fruity smell, followed by a nice pungent and fruity taste.  My suggestion throw on some Dead or Trailer Park boys and ride it out.”
“just bc something smells/look good doesn't mean it is. bought 4 grams of this recently and it would not stay light. worst purchase to date.”

“Good solid Indica, mellow, probably great for first time/new users.  I found it great when I was using a sativa blend for pain....it softened the sativa hyperactivity that tends to happen with me and painkillers of any sort.  Great recommendation from the knowledgeable staff at Cannabis Nation in Seaside, OR.”
“very relaxing ,calm and mellow state”
“love this strain very strong indaca.”
“It looks like it has a lot of keef on the bud, however I find this strain doesn't do much for me. Didn't help with pain or anxiety like I had hoped.”

“This strain is amazing! My local shop has some great looking Raspberry that gets me relaxed less than a minute from that first hit. Great flavor and burns good with a smooth sweet berry taste. Nice density and great smell. Just awesome bud!”
“A favorite for the relief of relaxation and joint pain. Tons and tons of Kief product when grinding.”
“Relaxing, but not overpowering. A nice indica for daytime.”
“I agree this is a nice instant feeling but doesnt last long at all. Does taste good enough to just keep smoking. My rating in based on duration not potency.”
“great Indica. Smoked before bed and fell into a deep after a sweet after slipping into a great deep stone. Loved it! Will put on my fav list.”
“Light,airy....smooth.”

“Very fuzzy with crystals, superb tropical smell. Not extremely pungent. Taste is rich and healthy... fruity.

Not particularly long lasting or strong but a well bodied high perfect for pain relief. Nothing very cerebral at all to be honest. No extreme ends of any side effects other than very dry eyes.”
“pretty good ! i liked it i find it very decent but a very good strain, one of them after a long day kinda things.”
“Tastes just like Raspberries  🍇👌”

“great for after a long day at work.
stress relief more
what ever mood your in though pryier to the session will impact your high.”

“-1st Degree BLACK BELT BUDS- This bud has been nice enough to come back to haunt me and man, do I love its flavor. The way the bud looks is just gorgeous. I've posted a picture before but it never posted right... It's very beautiful and the trichromes just fall off all over your fingers as you load a bowl, there are that many. A++ B\buds fer sure!”
“It's not very dense.”

“This strain is a strange one for me. I was hoping it would be good for my insomnia and it does make me fall asleep. After smoking this I am quickly overcome with heavy eyes and body melt. I was quickly swept off to sleep but then the upbeat nature of this strain kicks in and I would wake up with my mind racing many times throughout the night. For me this is a useless strain, too tiring to be a useful daytime smoke bu...”
“I have grown this strain for two years and enjoyed being around it for 5 years. she is a smooth smoke with a strong high. great tasting and usually very dense”
“very light high not memorable anyway. felt creamy smooth and light.”

“My all time fav strain for all my medical issues overall.

The flower smells amazing and smokes smooth. I use it throughout the day for my extreme anxiety and ptsd as well as severe nausea. One or two puffs and I’m able to function pain free around the house and be productive.

In shatter form I use for night time and extreme pain/anxiety. Great relaxation and sleep!! 

This is one strain no one can go wrong with as ...”
“Okay strain, not my fav. Also it's a little harsh on the throat.”
“I have grown this strain for two years and enjoyed being around it for 5 years. she is a smooth smoke with a strong high. great tasting and usually very dense”
“very light high not memorable anyway. felt creamy smooth and light.”

“My all time fav strain for all my medical issues overall.

The flower smells amazing and smokes smooth. I use it throughout the day for my extreme anxiety and ptsd as well as severe nausea. One or two puffs and I’m able to function pain free around the house and be productive.

In shatter form I use for night time and extreme pain/anxiety. Great relaxation and sleep!! 

This is one strain no one can go wrong with as ...”
“Okay strain, not my fav. Also it's a little harsh on the throat.”

“Very potent. Dense, dark vapor producing a pain-escaping/relieving, euphoric, and very creative experience. This one mellows you out and opens you up to appreciate a different frequency of time-perception, a time-warp in which sounds are muffled, colors enhanced, and the mind and body relaxes, grinning. Far away, into a techni-color dreamscape set in reality.”

“Just got done dabbing a beautiful piece of Raspberry Kush Rosin.  I put about .3grm ball of it in my Kandypen and went to the beach yesterday.  Awesome!!!!!  
Had no prob blasting away on it in public In fact the taste on the exhale is so much like Raspberries and Cream I couldn't believe it.  
I Came home and dabbed a nice .3 grm scoop out of my rig.  The flavor of Raspberries & cream is much more pronounced doing i...”

“Great strain! Great for before bedtime or have the afternoon off. Wasn't as strong as the blackberry (one of my all time favorite indicas) but nonetheless a great indica strain for sleep. Felt very heavy behind the eyes and a strong urge to close them and take a nap or sleep the rest of the night. Great body tingle as well. Overall awesome strain.”
“🔥🔥🔥 taste like cheesecake y'all!”

“My all time fav strain for all my medical issues overall.

The flower smells amazing and smokes smooth. I use it throughout the day for my extreme anxiety and ptsd as well as severe nausea. One or two puffs and I’m able to function pain free around the house and be productive.

In shatter form I use for night time and extreme pain/anxiety. Great relaxation and sleep!! 

This is one strain no one can go wrong with as ...”
“Very chill high, didn't couch locking me like some strong indica's can, really relaxed looking at shit from a different prospective vibe going on, thank you Raspberry Kush”
“🔥🔥🔥 taste like cheesecake y'all!”
“golden leaf concentrate: flavorful,fast acting,fairly intense buzz”
“Taste like raspberry yogurt on the exhale. Pretty good stuff and very dense nugets.”
“great strain heavy hitting and great tasting and beautiful bud heavenly green with flecks of purple on her very smooth smoking”
“tastes like the mystical jesus juice" of yester year.  This must be the strain.”"
“This was the first strain I had ever tried. I was inexperienced; I should have consulted other users for guidance but I can say that the aroma was very sweet and calming.”
“Definitely puts you on the couch”
“This was the first strain I had ever tried. I was inexperienced; I should have consulted other users for guidance but I can say that the aroma was very sweet and calming.”
“Very chill high, didn't couch locking me like some strong indica's can, really relaxed looking at shit from a different prospective vibe going on, thank you Raspberry Kush”
“very good the taste is very sweet as well as the high is really good i recommend this strain bomb;)”
“It tastes amazing & the high made me relaxed & have a great social day with friends. Definitely recommend it.”

“Definitely getting a Pine-Sol smell straight out of  the grind.
After hitting it I coughed a little bit it’s like a pleasant soft heavy hitter heavy on the nostril chambers and eyesockets.
I feel pretty relaxed after two hits I think I like this for afternoon night time”
“Sipped some tea and watched Argo. Great film!”
“golden leaf concentrate: flavorful,fast acting,fairly intense buzz”

“Wow! I broke out my Gpen herbal vaporizer out for this & it is truly an very tasty bud! Pick up right away that raspberry yogurt smoothness. And  a very delightful flowery after taste. A definite must try for all!”
“tastes like the mystical jesus juice" of yester year.  This must be the strain.”"
“This was the first strain I had ever tried. I was inexperienced; I should have consulted other users for guidance but I can say that the aroma was very sweet and calming.”
“Tasty and great for uplifting conversation.”
“Very great taste, nice smell. Great high, didn't make me couchlocked at all.”

“Definitely getting a Pine-Sol smell straight out of  the grind.
After hitting it I coughed a little bit it’s like a pleasant soft heavy hitter heavy on the nostril chambers and eyesockets.
I feel pretty relaxed after two hits I think I like this for afternoon night time”
“Sipped some tea and watched Argo. Great film!”
“I  frequently turn to this strain, as it never fails to blow me away. Words hardly scratch the surface on how wonderful this strain truly is.”
“Amazing strain if you love the green herb like me and you also love the fruit of the legendary raspberry then much like myself you shall love this strain.”
“This strain is FIRE🔥🔥!! From the sweet taste to the slow burning smooth hits. Honestly I love this flower. It gives a uplifting and energetic high. 👍🏻”
“Perfect For relaxing with Netflix. Very profound feelings of relaxation and comfort. Great for insomnia too.”
“So good. Nice high. Great raspberry smell and flavor”

“Normally my eyes don't get red when I burn, but after one joint, it was obvious.

Very tasty strain, indeed. Smooth on the exhale and definitely could taste some sweet raspberry notes. Not a croaking type of bud. 

For some reason, this strain left me feeling more energized and giggly rather than leaving me with a stoney body high. Regardless, I still like this kush.”
“Great indica with a berry and tropical flavor. Helps me relax after a long day. Surprisingly uplifting tho for an indica as i did not get couch lock.”

“Had a good experience with Raspberry Kush. As it is an indica, it gave me quite the body high, and I couldn’t feel my eyeballs. Made me feel cozy and i got to sleep pretty easily. Nice strain for if you feel like sitting down and relaxing to some music.”
“Has us coughing from the beginning but turned into a great high. Quick effect. This is a tingling, chill Sunday afternoon bud, while listening to music.”
“High quality mid. Tastes like raspberries.”
“Delicious”
“what a good way to wake up.. indica with good energy. Bonus to with a great taste mmmmm yummy..”
“The aroma and flavor of this strain will fulfill every sense in your body. the high is just as nice, relaxed, chilled, melts the muscles”
“Ey.i chose this as my morning medicine.and work flow is rather enjoyable!very lively and sweet.”
“An excellent strain. Great taste, smooth smoke, and very strong high. All the body numbing effects of an indica with a nice jolt of energy and creativeness.”
“Great indica”
“hate it”
“Pick up some super frosty like nugs of this. Normally can't do indica during the day but this one was manageable. Very nice high and taste”
“Nice relaxing high, great after a stressful week”
“I had a simliar strain years ago but never knew what it was. smooth smoke, great taste, perfect daytime strain with a relaxing body high and a decent feeling of euphoria.”
“raspberry kush got me meltin in bed”
“little to no smell. tastes good. would recommened.”
“I loved the taste! I enjoyed it very much, great potency!”
“Amazing head high super euphoric however I was almost hallucinating for a little while”
“While this is an indica strain, it's ability to increase awareness" (like a sativa) is worth pointing out. Smoking too much might keep you from falling asleep
column4: however the creative inspiration is absolutely present with Raspberry Kush.”"

column3: “smoking some right now.  even though its a mix i feel its effect.    really nice”
“Not a bad indica strain. Upper midshelf flower will give you a decent high nice body buzz. My wife loves it so I believe it will staple in our smoke sesh.”

“My all time fav strain for all my medical issues overall.

The flower smells amazing and smokes smooth. I use it throughout the day for my extreme anxiety and ptsd as well as severe nausea. One or two puffs and I’m able to function pain free around the house and be productive.

In shatter form I use for night time and extreme pain/anxiety. Great relaxation and sleep!! 

This is one strain no one can go wrong with as ...”

“Had a good experience with Raspberry Kush. As it is an indica, it gave me quite the body high, and I couldn’t feel my eyeballs. Made me feel cozy and i got to sleep pretty easily. Nice strain for if you feel like sitting down and relaxing to some music.”

“Definitely less overwhelming than Bubba Kush or OG kush. Feels amazing! Perfect for late night hangouts or late night creativity. Don’t think I’d ever smoke it in the daytime since the biggest side effect is some extreme light sensitivity. Makes Mario kart feel like a spiritual experience.”
“great Indica. Smoked before bed and fell into a deep after a sweet after slipping into a great deep stone. Loved it! Will put on my fav list.”
“love this strain very strong indaca.”
“It was produced by Heavenly Buds. A mellow, relaxed and happy high. It does make me slightly sleepy but I prefer Banana Kush.”

“Razzleberry is a pure indica cross of Raspberry Kush and Purple Kush. It has a sweet flavor and smells like berries. The THC content is strong, making for a potent, calming body high. This strain also has large quantities of CBD.”
“sweet and relaxed”

“Definitely getting a Pine-Sol smell straight out of  the grind.
After hitting it I coughed a little bit it’s like a pleasant soft heavy hitter heavy on the nostril chambers and eyesockets.
I feel pretty relaxed after two hits I think I like this for afternoon night time”

“great for after a long day at work.
stress relief more
what ever mood your in though pryier to the session will impact your high.”
“very light high not memorable anyway. felt creamy smooth and light.”
“Tastes just like Raspberries  🍇👌”
“I agree this is a nice instant feeling but doesnt last long at all. Does taste good enough to just keep smoking. My rating in based on duration not potency.”
“very relaxing ,calm and mellow state”
“da shit that all i got to say tht all i need to say exept doesn't last long”

“-1st Degree BLACK BELT BUD- Wow guys! This bud looks like it came strait outta magazine. I was gonna post a picture but my wimpy web cam doesn't do it justice. :( ITS BEAUTIFUL!!!! Smoke tastes great. Really enjoyed this one!”

“Raspberry Kush was one of my favorite indicas in WA. Higher Leaf in Bellevue has this strain packed with over 27% THC. Definitely a couch lock and sleepy strain, but I did smoke before activities and did just fine. Raspberry Kush gives you a great body and head high along with creativity.”

“Smell : deep fruity and skunky notes - hints of pine
Taste : persistent fruity taste and aroma - bright and flowery - little hints of pine and chocolate in the initial toke - fades to a skunky sweet berry aftertaste. Excellent flavor
Visual : dark green buds tight and dense with very little leafiness.”
“Not a typical indica. Creative and focused strain”
“Great indica with a berry and tropical flavor. Helps me relax after a long day. Surprisingly uplifting tho for an indica as i did not get couch lock.”
“So good. Nice high. Great raspberry smell and flavor”
“Amazing strain if you love the green herb like me and you also love the fruit of the legendary raspberry then much like myself you shall love this strain.”
“This was the first strain I had ever tried. I was inexperienced; I should have consulted other users for guidance but I can say that the aroma was very sweet and calming.”
“It's not very dense.”

“-1st Degree BLACK BELT BUDS- This bud has been nice enough to come back to haunt me and man, do I love its flavor. The way the bud looks is just gorgeous. I've posted a picture before but it never posted right... It's very beautiful and the trichromes just fall off all over your fingers as you load a bowl, there are that many. A++ B\buds fer sure!”
“pretty good ! i liked it i find it very decent but a very good strain, one of them after a long day kinda things.”

“Very fuzzy with crystals, superb tropical smell. Not extremely pungent. Taste is rich and healthy... fruity.

Not particularly long lasting or strong but a well bodied high perfect for pain relief. Nothing very cerebral at all to be honest. No extreme ends of any side effects other than very dry eyes.”
“Light,airy....smooth.”
“Relaxing, but not overpowering. A nice indica for daytime.”
“A favorite for the relief of relaxation and joint pain. Tons and tons of Kief product when grinding.”

“This strain is amazing! My local shop has some great looking Raspberry that gets me relaxed less than a minute from that first hit. Great flavor and burns good with a smooth sweet berry taste. Nice density and great smell. Just awesome bud!”
“It looks like it has a lot of keef on the bud, however I find this strain doesn't do much for me. Didn't help with pain or anxiety like I had hoped.”

“Good solid Indica, mellow, probably great for first time/new users.  I found it great when I was using a sativa blend for pain....it softened the sativa hyperactivity that tends to happen with me and painkillers of any sort.  Great recommendation from the knowledgeable staff at Cannabis Nation in Seaside, OR.”
“just bc something smells/look good doesn't mean it is. bought 4 grams of this recently and it would not stay light. worst purchase to date.”

“This one was great for a night chilling with friends. Made good conversation and later was amazing for some gaming. Wouldn't suggest for a busy day.  Nice fruity smell, followed by a nice pungent and fruity taste.  My suggestion throw on some Dead or Trailer Park boys and ride it out.”

“bought some an eighth today and I gotta say I love this weed. I smoked just a little bit and i felt GREAT (I still feel good). I could notice it right away but definitely takes a couple of minutes to hit you.”
“A very amazing strain.. put me on my ass. it made me feel very relieved from a stressful day. A++ would recommend to any daily smokers”
“very nice looking strain! nice uplifting stone...  lasted about 2 hours...”
“damn...”
“Good for late night, plus helps with good night sleeping.”

“I love the taste of this one! It was really nicely berry tasting on the exhale. It also dealt with pain moderately well, it also helped me sleep but didn't give me uncomfortable couch lock. Munchies were moderate, no notable cotton mouth or dry eyes. I did experience some pretty strong paranoia as the high wore off, which is why I gave it 3 instead of 4 stars,.”
“Very impressed perks you up, only one downfall the wife just kept talking.......”

“Acquired this strain for the first time  at $14.00 a gram from Cougar Cannabis.  The budtender directed my attention to this beauty and I am hoping he is there the next time I stop in on a Thursday evening. :)  This flower purchase was a toke that went straight to the middle of my brain.  Instant relaxation and euphoric feelings were the result of only one bowl hit.  The product was tested by 3BAnalytical. And purcha...”
“One of the best smelling buds I have ever had. It's a slow build on the high but at its peak it is pure indica body high. Not the strongest but definitely not one to miss!”

“Normally my eyes don't get red when I burn, but after one joint, it was obvious.

Very tasty strain, indeed. Smooth on the exhale and definitely could taste some sweet raspberry notes. Not a croaking type of bud. 

For some reason, this strain left me feeling more energized and giggly rather than leaving me with a stoney body high. Regardless, I still like this kush.”
“Perfect For relaxing with Netflix. Very profound feelings of relaxation and comfort. Great for insomnia too.”
“I  frequently turn to this strain, as it never fails to blow me away. Words hardly scratch the surface on how wonderful this strain truly is.”

“⭐️tastes just like it's named with a pucker and licking of lips to follow there is a second round of uber sweet fruity flavor. This strong & unusual taste overwhelmed the Kush side of this strain. With the Kush adding the creamy, smoother side to taste giving it a yummy dessert like palate there was a need for more balance.  Not sure if this is common in the strain or if it was just the way it was grown?

☄️The smell...”
“Sipped some tea and watched Argo. Great film!”
“tastes like the mystical jesus juice" of yester year.  This must be the strain.”"
“golden leaf concentrate: flavorful,fast acting,fairly intense buzz”
“🔥🔥🔥 taste like cheesecake y'all!”
“I have grown this strain for two years and enjoyed being around it for 5 years. she is a smooth smoke with a strong high. great tasting and usually very dense”

“This strain is a strange one for me. I was hoping it would be good for my insomnia and it does make me fall asleep. After smoking this I am quickly overcome with heavy eyes and body melt. I was quickly swept off to sleep but then the upbeat nature of this strain kicks in and I would wake up with my mind racing many times throughout the night. For me this is a useless strain, too tiring to be a useful daytime smoke bu...”
“Great fruity flavor. The high made me really relaxed and a good body melt but didn't make me lazy making it one of my favorite strains.”
“Damn pretty good. Good taste broke down really good but a little harsh on inhale. Had me coughing my ass off lol.”
“Incredibly clean, tasty and relaxing. At 40$ an eighth at the flowershop" in warren. Great for any smoking method
“Okay strain, not my fav. Also it's a little harsh on the throat.”

“Very potent. Dense, dark vapor producing a pain-escaping/relieving, euphoric, and very creative experience. This one mellows you out and opens you up to appreciate a different frequency of time-perception, a time-warp in which sounds are muffled, colors enhanced, and the mind and body relaxes, grinning. Far away, into a techni-color dreamscape set in reality.”

“Just got done dabbing a beautiful piece of Raspberry Kush Rosin.  I put about .3grm ball of it in my Kandypen and went to the beach yesterday.  Awesome!!!!!  
Had no prob blasting away on it in public In fact the taste on the exhale is so much like Raspberries and Cream I couldn't believe it.  
I Came home and dabbed a nice .3 grm scoop out of my rig.  The flavor of Raspberries & cream is much more pronounced doing i...”
“Body high, light tingles. Very calming and soothing.”
“Jagermeister replacement”

“Great strain! Great for before bedtime or have the afternoon off. Wasn't as strong as the blackberry (one of my all time favorite indicas) but nonetheless a great indica strain for sleep. Felt very heavy behind the eyes and a strong urge to close them and take a nap or sleep the rest of the night. Great body tingle as well. Overall awesome strain.”
“Taste like raspberry yogurt on the exhale. Pretty good stuff and very dense nugets.”
“great strain heavy hitting and great tasting and beautiful bud heavenly green with flecks of purple on her very smooth smoking”
“Great strain! Had me fried”
“Super sweet smell. One of the quickest flowering times at less than 6 weeks !”
“Definitely puts you on the couch”

“OMG. The crystals! Crystals everywhere! I came in looking for some $40/qrtr stuff, but when I saw this on the shelf I couldn't resist. Giant healthy buds that look like they've been rolled in crystals or something, it's ridiculous. When you smoke it's a nice hard hitting indica with a pleasant skunky smell.”
“Very chill high, didn't couch locking me like some strong indica's can, really relaxed looking at shit from a different prospective vibe going on, thank you Raspberry Kush”
“very good the taste is very sweet as well as the high is really good i recommend this strain bomb;)”

“Raspberry Kush is such a delicious smelling and tasting strain. It's also great for anxiety. I found it made me feel very comfortable socially. There's an intense body relaxation, I breathed so deeply while medicated with this. Surprisingly though it didn't make me necessarily want to sit down. I wanted to talk and do things. It eventually does taper off into a good sleepiness. Very effective for insomnia.
Follow me ...”

“This ganja is a very fine smoke, extremely tasty! The high hits on inhale from a bong but not too hard, a very chill very delicious smoke. The high had me for about 2 -2 and a half hours. I would recommend this strain to anyone for recreational or medicinal use!”

“This does an ok job of what I bought it for, which was mostly insomnia.  It's a good mellow high, that seems to take the edge off and help to quiet my mind.  Not quite as well as Orange Kush, but it's sufficient.”

“This has been a pleasant experience with an Indica Kush.  some Indica's put me down in a couple of hours and feel lethargic, drowsy and a need to sleep.  I haven't had that experience with this Raspberry... and yes, beautiful buds with a heavenly, almost piney, scent and tastes wonderful.”
“Very strong with a good flavor. It creeps up on you.”

“Migraine pain undeterminable; nausea 8 when I medicated round 0200 or so. Takes bout 10 min to start working. Pain gone; nausea all but gone (3-4). No anxiety/paranoia (an absolute must for me). Body high allowed me sleep & quickly which is exactly what I needed. Head high as heavy as I've experienced but had not slept yet last night. Thought maybe I wuz goin crazy. Raspberry Kush saved my sleep big time. Highly reco...”
“This strain looks great, tastes great, and will make you hungry as hell then pass the fuck out. Awesome bud.”
“Great for anxiety, could be a little heavier, but over all give it a strong b++.. Great to have conversions and socialize.”

“honestly,  this is one of my faves.  always leaves me in a great mood, uplifted and goofy, end up always talking everyone's ears off. if I smoke to much totally comatoses me:p you can never go wrong with the strain!”
“Very nice strain! Got a dub tonight and it really helped me master my Metroid Prime skills. Not to mention cured my hangover, anxiety, and helped me sleep like a baby. Would recommend.”
“Definitely one of the best berry strains! raspberry cough is dope as well.”

Dominic and I hit three bowl packs from the bong of this Raspberry Kush.  and jesus fucking christ man.  this shit is like 24% THC.  Im pretty sure thats the second highest out of all of the stuff I've tr...”
“Nice strong indica. Good taste.”
“Tastes great, uplifting, good with depression, anxiety for me. Kept me going, nice light head change.”
“A nice high, started out feeling super floaty. Wasn't too sleepy, maybe a little couch locked. Got crazy munchies though.”
“Relaxing”
“this wakes me up--- I Dont't like that for a kush!!!!!”
“I like that Raspberry Kush. It was nice and smooth.”
“I must have had a bad batch? but the high did not last very long. very distinctive leaves and a great taste but durability not so much”
“This is the perfect ending to the day. Lovely dense and decorated nugs! smooth on the inhale and a fresh relaxing stone!”

“Raspberry kush is one of the strains  all my friends always talk about. It's one of the super flavorful strains that makes your mouth water and you brain melt (when grown well). I thinks its one of the true to kush strains that really keeps Kush's name a trustable and respected goto. I personally find that a lot of strains have tons of flavor but tend to be lacking in Thc raspberry included but there's no denying whe...”
“Very strong taste, heavy high. Harsh on your throat.”
“Great stuff! Takes the edge" off
column4: great for fibromyalgia pain (imho) makes me chatty and not real laid back for Indica! It's fun!”"

column3: “I got this today and just smoked 2 lil bowls and I'm on my couch enjoying his ride! I got a bug 3.5g bud of this and I'm stoked to enjoy the rest. I'm stoned but yet alert. Overall I'm very satisfied!”
“One of the best tasting strains I've had to date! Taste is good and the high is great. It's not as good as some, but yummy non the less.”
“upper----sativa feel”

“Have been smoking raspberry kush for a few days now and every time weather it be a joint, blunt, or a bowl it has had a very berry taste. Definitely relaxing but at the same time all we could actually get done was debate. Would recommend this for chilling with some of the closest friends. Couch lock and talkative”
“Very good bud!   I enjoyed this bud very much and would recommend it to my friend's!”

“I had a good body high  and was able to study for a math exam. Anything that can curb the hell of cramming  for an exam is  a necessity. A nice smooth exhale is the creamy part of the raspberries and cream taste. Nice dense crystal covered flowers. Just another great kush.”

“this is my daily smoker 10 times a day.  if you get at perfect dryness this beautiful flowers ground up produces an amazing amount of pollen.  I have never got burnt out on the by far right now my favorite daily smoker.”
“Amazing flower. Relaxing and very nice for pain. Great before bedtime. One of my new favorites.”

“I as afraid from the description this might be an energy draining strain but, fortunately, I didn't find that to be the case at all.  You may not want o run out and do errands but it's very upbeat and creative. Creative is an adjective I use sparingly in my reviews but this one will make you want to write, read, play an instrument or something or at least appreciate the work of others. Physically, it is very relaxing...”
“This is the best tasting concentrate I've had!”
“the raspberry cream description is right on point. this bud is delicious!”

“This RAspberry kush will knock you on your ass. When smoked out of a bubbler the high comes on real strong. The buds are covered in crystals and have some colorful streaks through them. The producer was Seattle Private Reserve with a THC level just over 23 and half % I picked this up at White Rabbit”
“Looks amazing, smells great but the taste is rather weak and the high is as well. Would not buy again unless the strain is greatly improved.”
“Love. Less sedating than blackberry kush, keep eyes open for 'fruit loops', mix of raspberry and blackberry kush.”
“didn't really like this strain. the taste wasn't great. and the high was ok”
“Really foul after taste for me after I smoke this strain.. It also isn't very strong,  I found myself having to smoke multiple bowls to have relief!”

“When the young man from Mobile Meds showed up I found he had an outstanding selection of flowers. I bought the Raspberry Kush on the basis of its intense fragrance. After grinding I found this intense to smoke, felt nice going down, and had a nice gentle effect that lasted a good long time. This helps to control my pain and eases the PTSD I deal with on a daily basis. This was a good choice for me!

Kudos to Mobile M...”
“not for heavy stoners, alright relaxed high”
“this train is amazing it's a good one to get medicated and night surprisingly it doesn't get you hungry and it dont give you headaches which is a plus plus I recommended”
“The Bud Looks Very Nice And Every Inch Of The Bud Is Covered In Crystals, Also I Would Say This Is A Peek-a-boo Weed”
“I got this strain to smoke out of my vape and the highs were never great, very laggy and down. Much better smoked out of a water bong!”
